body: This treasure type is made up of items that would typically be carried by a monster that relies on melee or ranged combat. It includes armor, coins, potions, weapons, and wondrous items.
name: Type F, Combatant Gear
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Appendix/Treasure Generator/Step 3 Generate Treasure/Treasure Types/Type F/Combatant Gear
